title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: In the dim light of the abandoned warehouse, a sleek yet worn pistol rests on the cold concrete floor. Its metallic surface gleams faintly, hinting at stories of battles fought and dangers faced. The grip, though scuffed, offers a reassuring familiarity. As you pick it up, the weight feels just right, a partner in your quest for survival. With a single bullet chambered, this weapon brims with potentialâ€”an instrument of precision amidst chaos. Will you wield it to protect your allies or to unleash chaos upon your foes? The choice is yours in this unforgiving world.
